articles.description: Aiden Markram makes a brilliant century to put South Africa within tantalising distance of a historic victory over Australia in the World Test Championship final.

articles.description: Liverpool agree a £116m deal, which includes a guaranteed £100m, to sign Germany attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz from Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz: Liverpool agree £116m deal to sign midfielder from Bayer Leverkusen

articles.description: Australia batter Steve Smith goes to hospital after dislocating his little finger on day three of the World Test Championship final against South Africa.
articles.title: Steve Smith: Australia batter goes to hospital after dislocating finger in World Test Championship final

articles.description: Tottenham are interested in signing Brentford striker Bryan Mbeumo.

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu is outclassed by world number five Zheng Qinwen in the quarter-finals at Queen's.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Emma Raducanu loses to Zheng Qinwen in quarter-finals, Tatjana Maria stuns Elena Rybakina

articles.description: Pakistan batter Babar Azam will play in the Big Bash for the first time after he is signed by Sydney Sixers.
articles.title: Big Bash League: Pakistan's Babar Azam signs for Sydney Sixers

articles.description: Real Madrid sign 17-year-old Franco Mastantuono, the youngest player to ever feature for Argentina, from River Plate.
articles.title: Franco Mastantuono: Real Madrid sign Argentina record breaker from River Plate

articles.description: Former England captain Owen Farrell is close to finalising a sensational return to Saracens.
articles.title: Owen Farrell close to Saracens return from Racing 92
